resources.string: This application is meant as a demonstration of how the adoption of a cat could be fully integrated into an app via a backend database and user verification system. This mobile application was created under an Apache 2.0 License (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
Whilst use of this applications source code is free to everyone, the explicit copyright is owned by the sole author Samuel Jones (samjones714@gmail.com)
It is distributed open source at https://github.com/Pasarus/FelineAdoptionAgencyMajorProject

As part of this application certain icons have been used, these Material Design based icon are created by the community and are distrubuted under SIL Open Font License 1.1 (https://opensource.org/licenses/OFL-1.1).
The icons created by google as part of Material Design are distributed under an Apache 2.0 License (http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0).
The following icons, were made under SIL Open Font License 1.1 by @Templarian on Twitter:
Can be around primary school aged kids
Cannot be around primary age kids
Can be around High School children
Cannot be around High School kids
This cat has a disability, please read the description
Are you sure you would like to adopt this cat?

By agreeing to adopt this cat, you agree that an agent of the adoption charity may visit your home to provide a basic routine inspection. This inspection is to ensure the safety of all parties involved, including but not limited to the cat, the adopter, and the inspector. To adopt a cat an administration fee must be made payable during the inspection to the inspector. Furthermore, by agreeing to adopt this cat you provide that you are willing to pay the adoption fee and provide adequate and safe housing for the cat. Please do not adopt a cat if you believe that you are going to be at some point unable to look after this animal, or provide safe housing. If this cat is an outdoor cat you must not live on a main road to avoid the cat being harmed or worse. For further information do not hesistate to call or ask for advice by using the phone number on our website.
picture of the cat being adopted
You haven\'t signed in to the app yet! please sign in or adopt a cat to see these statuses!
You have been accepted please pick up your cat!
Image of the cat being featured
This is the adoption status details
Are you sure you want to cancel the adoption for this cat?
Please sign in to use the Saved Cat feature!
Would you like to be replied to, by the developer?
You will be asked to login to the application if not already done so when you click send, this is to reduce spam, and allow responses from developers, to your emails.

Once you find a cat that you may consider adopting tap on the info card. To get more information, after you have decided to adopt a specific cat, scroll down on the extra information screen and click the adopt button, if you haven\'t logged in, you will be asked to login, after logging in click the button again and the adoption forms will assist you.
Once using the tool, find a cat by browsing our selection, a cat will be displayed in a info card.
You need to find a cat in our helpful cat finder tool!, to do this please navigate to the cat finder tab using the bottom navigation bar.
Notifies a user of any change to their adoptions
Any news from the adoption app that you may need to know
When a new cat is listed, recieve a notification
